channel.title: Pdf-Generation on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Pdf-Generation on Arrans github.io

item.title: ether/etherpad-lite
item.description: Etherpad: A modern really-real-time collaborative document editor.

item.title: solworktech/md2pdf
item.description: A CLI utility that generates PDFs from Markdown. Features: syntax highlighting (for code blocks), dark, light and custom themes, TOC autogeneration,tables, pagination control (using horizontal lines - especially useful for presentations), page Footer (consisting of author, title and page number), support of non-Latin charsets and multiple font

item.title: boxesandglue/boxesandglue
item.description: PDF rendering library for Go using TeX algorithms.

item.title: lnenad/newser
item.description: Newser is a simple utility to generate a pdf with you favorite news articles
